data.lyric:
[ti:Outta Time]
[ar:Bryson Tiller/Drake]
[al:A N N I V E R S A R Y (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Outta Time - Bryson Tiller (布莱森·提勒)/Drake
[00:05.52]Composed by：Bryson Tiller
[00:11.04]Drake：
[00:11.26]I've been thinkin' maybe
[00:12.65]Things were never the way
[00:15.52]We made 'em out to be
[00:17.67]How we thought they were
[00:20.32]Lately I'm not sure
[00:22.82]One thing for sure
[00:24.69]Is when we're together
[00:26.46]
[00:27.22]We're toxic as ever
[00:29.52]Make no mistake all the roads lead
[00:32.01]To we shouldn't be together
[00:34.16]Drake：
[00:34.56]
[00:42.42]I don't know why I
[00:45.63]
[00:46.51]Still play into your palm
[00:48.55]
[00:49.18]Even though I know what you want
[00:51.64]Been twisted off you so long oh-ho
[00:56.98]
[00:58.52]'Cause it's complicated far from simple
[01:01.11]Always find a way to dodge these issues
[01:04.36]Can't seem to shake it not for nothin'
[01:06.28]
[01:06.81]The problem is we're not discussin'
[01:08.78]All that screaming yelling's not becomin' to you
[01:11.92]Things just can't be fixed we're out of time

[01:15.47]
[01:19.05]Oh yeah
[01:23.24]

[01:35.50]
[01:39.99]Oh oh oh
[01:40.66]
[01:41.53]Sometimes I don't know know you no not anymore no
[01:47.13]And I can't wait 'til we find a way to part ways
[01:51.95]Seems like your days are dark days
[01:54.69]Seems like you mad at the small things I
[01:58.48]
[01:59.19]Admit it it seems like you weighin' the hard way
[02:03.75]We fight through night and all day
[02:05.93]Bryson Tiller：
[02:06.34]I I still don't know why I
[02:11.79]Still play into your palm
[02:14.53]Even though I know what you want
[02:16.79]

[02:23.20]Yeah yeah
